sub_title: Global Sr. Product Owner / Web Domain Lead
summary:
An experienced senior Scrum/SAFe certified Product Owner having UX and E-commerce blood flowing through his veins and
- can create strategical and execute roadmaps
- someone who takes responsibility for his product
- realises your needs with the right solutions
- solves your issues fast and correct
- works with the team to deliver what is most important and has real value to the customer and the business
and makes sure things are getting realised and not being talked about for ever? Welcome to my world ;)

‘‘If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.‘‘

contributors.headline: Global Sr. Product Owner / Web Domain Lead

profile_positions.description: Web Lead and Senior Product Owner for Philips-Hue.com, Wiz Connected and all other B2C brands from Signify. Managing web and development teams up to 30 colleagues working on delivering the best customer journeys for visitors of all our global Philips Hue websites and other Signify B2C brands.
profile_positions.title: Web Lead & Senior Product Owner Philips Hue / B2C

profile_positions.description:
After growing the team from about 5 people when started to about 2 teams of 12-15 people (multi disciplinary scrum teams) for the complete digital domain of Signify, I moved to focus on the Philips Hue only and improve the eco-system, processes and business/customer value for the complete Philips Hue  digital domain. Now within Hue we also grew to 2 full scrum teams with dev, QA, design and BA's and as myself as the Senior Product Owner being responsible to deliver the roadmap of the customer-facing Hue website (marketing and shop website). 

The responsibility includes creating/aligning on philips-hue.com's strategy and roadmap and the development and innovation of the domain and all the basics know tasks of a true PO.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Product Owner Philips Hue website

profile_positions.description:
At Signify ((f.k.a. Philips Lighting) I'm the global product owner for the open customer facing platforms and brands on all locales worldwide, hosted on Adobe AEM. Working with 2 scrumteams of about 12 people each (developers, designers, analists) on both the back-end and front-end of the websites.

Examples of sites the teams work for:
- Philips Lighting (http://www.lighting.philips.com/)
- Meethue (https://www2.meethue.com/)
- Interact Lighting (https://www.interact-lighting.com/)
- Signify (https://www.signify.com/)
- Massive (https://www.massive.eu/)

Signify (Euronext: LIGHT), formerly known as Philips Lighting, is the world leader in lighting for professionals and consumers and lighting for the Internet of Things. Our Philips products, Interact connected lighting systems and data-enabled services, deliver business value and transform life in homes, buildings and public spaces. With 2017 sales of EUR 7.0 billion, approximately 32,000 employees and a presence in over 70 countries, we unlock the extraordinary potential of light for brighter lives and a better world.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner Digital Platforms

profile_positions.location: High Tech Campus Eindhoven / The Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
Starting as a Product Owner for .com in September 2017 being responsible for the all front-facing digital platforms (AEM, Adobe Target, Adobe Analytics, Adobe DTM, Microsites) for our customers. These platforms support all Lighting websites like for example all Signify (company) and brand websites like Philips Lighting, Interact Lighting and Meethue.com across the world. Currently I have 2 scrum teams working on all platforms within my responsibility. 

I'm not the typical Product Owner as my for me it is my way of living and breathing the customer experience which is also shown by my past Experience in the area of development and User Experience.  My ambition and drive for digital and bringing customer and business value results in being a PO which is creating a rich Experience across and within the digital touch-points for Philips Lighting and also connecting this into the world outside our company including closing the gap and maximize cooperation between business and IT. 

Philips Lighting is worldwide's leading company in Lighting, with amazing business products from Stadium LED lighting to the wonderful world of Philips Hue lighting for consumers. In this industry the digital landscape is an important part of the customer experience getting inspired, informed and supported on every topic of our products & services.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner Digital Platforms

profile_positions.description:
As a Sr. Innovation Manager I'm responsible for the digital domain within Innovation at Essent in the Netherlands. Being the central point of contact on digital from all RWE companies to Essent. I will add the digital DNA within the whole innovation process and the products and services created as short and long term solutions for our customers and the company.

My primary focus will be on the digital level, building and supporting strategic development & idea creation and take control of the design and development of the digital solutions.

I'm the product owner of new products and services like apps (supporting energy and non energy related areas) and platforms (new services, websites and tools)
profile_positions.title: Senior Innovation Manager / Digital Product Owner

profile_positions.description:
As a strategic and (domain) developer responsible for overall digital strategy of the digital domain within Essent and Energiedirect.nl for both B2C and B2B markets. Focusing on developing (concepting, requirements, leading the design team) and accelerating the digital domain (vision, roadmaps and inspiration), on both basic optimization and innovation levels. 

This includes:
- Create a decentralized digital minded organization with the digital DNA inserted in various places within the organization
- Connect to internal (Essent) innovation and external (RWE, startups) initiatives
- Create concepts, develop ideas and realize new platforms and toolings (like apps)
- Inspire, inform and advise on digital
- Create and implement a tactical approach on digital both both brands.
profile_positions.title: Strategic Lead Digital at Essent

profile_positions.description:
I'm responsible for the development and innovation and strategy of the digital (online) channel at Essent. 

Various project I've managed as UX lead:
- Essent Nest - http://essent.nl/nest (digital approach and integration)
- Essent Shop - http://essent.nl/shop (strategy, concept and realization)
- E-inzicht product, portal, app - http://www.essent.nl/e-inzicht (concept and realization)
- BespaarCoach (energy advise tool, instore and online) - http://essent.nl/bespaarcoach
- Essent Zonnepanelen - http://spaarpanelen.essent.nl (portal concept and realization)
- Essent.nl mobile and desktop development (strategy)

My role is split into project management and coaching the operational team on various projects (from creating innovative new online products and service to sales and service projects), and take care of online channel development (creating and translating vision and trends into an operational approach and advice).

Example tasks:
- Defining and executing digital strategy
- Digital concept creation and realisation
- Multi platform development and management
profile_positions.title: Senior Marketeer Digital & UX Lead

profile_positions.description:
(Capgemini project)

Working as UX (User Experience) Strategist and (Online) Marketeer in the Sales&Retention and the Innovation teams within the Essent Marketing Online division.

My core tasks are:
- Convert market propositions into online solutions
- Maximize usability and persuasive design (UX elements)
- Setup and optimize campaign interaction and (e-)marketing flows
- Optimize and innovate UX related processes
- Lead Smart Energy Online team
- Smart Energy Online strategy and implementation
profile_positions.title: UX Strategist & Smart Energy Online Lead

profile_positions.description:
(Capgemini project)

Working as UX strategist & analyst in the Concept & Design E-Business team.

My core tasks are translating a campaign proposition into the online environment. This means advising on E-Strategy and E-Marketing channels, create an online concept and vision, go through the whole User Experience process to create a fully optimized and highly converting website, keeping the main aspects of UX (Usability and Psychology/PET Design) in mind. But also focus and advise on innovation and enhancement possibilities on the suggested propositions and concept. 

On the mobile side I’ve been involved in the development of 2 new apps for the iOS and Android mobile phones and tablets (iPad).

A description of tasks:
- Optimize overall offline <-> online user experience (UX)
- 'Be' cross channel 
- Maximize conversion rates
- Intergrate new media channels (e.g; mobile, social)
- Create online concepts
- Translate general campaign requirements into online propositions & websites
- Realize E-marketing concepts
- Incorporate persuasive (PET) design
- Apply AIDA(S) principles
- Analyse and optimize campaigns
- Using Axure for prototyping
profile_positions.title: User Experience (UX) Analyst / Strategist

profile_positions.description:
Working as a senior certified usability analyst in the Online Solutions (former User Experience) cluster of Capgemini. My core role is the UX designer & strategist role in its broadest meaning.

Large projects:
- The large projects are shown as seperate positions. 

Smaller projects:
- Search Engine Marketing for Capgemini Consulting (04/2008-05/2008)
- Interaction Designer at Stater (04/2008-05/2008)
- Online Survey developer for Jeugdzorg (04/2008)
profile_positions.title: Senior User Experience (UX) Consultant

profile_positions.description:
(Capgemini project)

A presentable, highly attractive and interactive demo has been created for an advanced cloud solution. During this solution I've created the persona's and scenario baseline during brainstorm sessions and created a blazing demo with a huge factor within a tight deadline.

For the demo the advanced iRise software had been used to create an interactive, dynamic and interesting demo experience.
profile_positions.title: User Experience (UX) Designer

profile_positions.description:
(Capgemini project)

During the first year KLM is implementing a new web analytics package. My tasks is to be the link between the business owners and the web analytics analyst and the IT developers/experts.

Also involved or leading in:
- web analytics environment setup
- testing technical solution
- optimizing web analytics implementation process
- adserving operational proces 

After moving from a basic implementation to an advanced implemenation of Web Analytics software at KLM, Air France will have an advanced implementation as well. 

My tasks are next to being the linking pin between the business owners, the analyst and the IT expert, also to guide Air France through the process to ensure best practices can be used, all experiences are re-used and the implementation is done in the most efficient way.
profile_positions.title: Web Analytics / UX

profile_positions.description:
(Capgemini project)

Did several tasks within the user experience project, like interaction design and search engine optimization advise. Also involved with investigating new e-marketing 'tools / concepts' to reach the target audience.
profile_positions.title: User Experience (UX) Consultant

profile_positions.description:

In the role of Migration Manager managing the process and content of electronic banking packages migrations for wholesale clients like Shell, KLM, Thales etc.  (advising, legal, outsourceing and process setup) to a new online platform.
profile_positions.title: Electronic Banking Migrations

profile_positions.description: Creation and realisation of an e-marketing plan on how to approach the market with digital products.

volunteer_experiences.description: The Capgemini personnel association with about 1800 members has a board of members who create, provide and execute activities each month, from small workshops and tours to major events like trips to Berlin and Euro Disney. I started as an event organizer and joined the daily board to focus on marketing and communication as vice chairman.
Training and co-coaching a women soccer team (16-30)
Coaching the women soccer team (VR2) of the Baronie soccer club in Breda
I'm working for the HOUSE of DJ's as eventmanager. Setting up events of various sizes and types together with an operational team and other HODJS core team members.
